item.description:

case 2486: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("train! do push ups now!"); actionTimer = 12; setAnimation(2765); addItem(555,5); addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[20]), 20); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

can anyone help me with that ^^, i placed a nature altar somewhere, and it doesnâ€™t give xp or items. what did i do wrong?
